status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"56oqj","text":"Change media every other day – mTeSR Plus with 1ml primocin","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4cakl","text":"Always warm media to room temperature before use","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2lbs2","text":"Aspirate using glass pipette attached to vacuum and replenish with mTeSR plus ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"76pjc","text":"Passage every 4-6 days (whenever colonies are 70-80% confluent- depends on the density that you plate) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5m97u","text":"Coat desired number and size of plates with matrigel/geltrex and incubate overnight or \u003e4hr at 37C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b8lop","text":"On day of passage, cool the coated plates at room temperature for \u003e1hr then aspirate matrigel/geltrex then add appropriate amount of media for well size ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b6gq8","text":"Aspirate media from cells and wash with DBPS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d95ci","text":"Add appropriate amount of ReLeSR and aspirate within 1 minute ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6m715","text":"Incubate at RT for 4-5 minutes ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d21lb","text":"Spray wells with media (1ml/well for 6w) with p1000 then hold the plate in one hand and use other hand to firmly tap the side of the plate to detach the cells ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"509v4","text":"Use p1000 to wash/collect the detached cells- gently pipet the cells 2-4 times, being careful not to break the aggregates into single cells and transfer to labeled 15ml tube ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ss6b","text":"Plate the cell aggregate mixture at the desired density onto the pre-coated wells containing media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bvs45","text":"Usually 1:10 - 1:20 or 1:4-1:5 depending on cell density ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"61j3","text":"Check that there is an appropriate number of cells under the microscope then place in the incubator at 37C; Move the plate in several quick, short, back-and-forth and side-to-side motions to evenly distribute the cells ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"duofr","text":"Do not disturb the plate for 24 hours ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"431rq","text":"Prepare coated 6w plates with 1 well for each cryovial (same as step 1 above)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"22ok1","text":"Can prepare 2 wells for each cryovial – depending on how confluent you want cells to be thawed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"jffk","text":"On day of thawing, cool plates at RT \u003e1hr before use but do not add media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4kofn","text":"Label 15ml tubes for each cryovial that is being thawed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9s1vf","text":"Take cryovials out of liquid nitrogen","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4q7kc","text":"Thaw cryovials in dry bath until only one ice crystal is left","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bkf3j","text":"Use a glass pipette to remove cells from cryovial and transfer to labeled 15ml tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d0g5","text":"Slowly add 5ml mTeSR Plus dropwise into 15ml tube to avoid shocking the cells – rotate the tube while adding media to ensure even distribution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8ks11","text":"Centrifuge 3 mins at 300g","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"iue5","text":"Aspirate supernatant – okay to leave a little film to avoid disturbing the pellet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9aroj","text":"10.   Aspirate coating matrix from prepared plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d8nt0","text":"Use glass pipette to add 2ml mTeSR Plus with 5µM ROCK-Inhibitor and forcefully mix to break up pellet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dfnth","text":"Add 2ml/well cell suspension to coated plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"en9f6","text":"Incubate at 37C and change media with regular mTeSR Plus the next day/24 hours after to remove ROCK-I","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6lnhh","text":"Determine which wells on 6w plate are ready to be cryopreserved","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"rlg7","text":"Prepare labels and vials (2 vials per clone) – use label machine to create labels, ex. “g1b1c1A1”","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2uh9v","text":"Put label on vial and scan barcode on bottom of vial in excel to connect it to the right clone ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eip8h","text":"Aspirate media from wells and wash with DPBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"foubj","text":"Add 1ml ReLeSR per well and aspirate within 1 minute","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d3mgu","text":"Incubate at RT for 4-5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"an3nk","text":"Spray wells with media (1ml/well for 6 well) then hold the plate in one hand and use other hand to firmly tap the side of the plate to detach cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"akq7k","text":"Use P1000 to wash/collect the detached cells – gently pipet the cells 3-4 times, being careful not to break cell aggregates into single cells – and transfer  to labeled 15 ml tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4l23n","text":"Centrifuge for 3 min at 300g","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bjqpf","text":"Gently aspirate the supernatant without disturbing the pellet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8r68u","text":"Use 5ml glass pipette to resuspend pellet in 2 ml mFreSR","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8l6tv","text":"10.   Transfer 1ml of cell aggregate mixture into each labeled cryovial","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1hu7k","text":"11.   Transfer cryovials into isopropanol container then put it in -80C freezer for 48 hrs","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cigi2","text":"12.   Transfer cryovials from isopropanol containers to boxes from LN2 on dry ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6sed8","text":"Need three people – one checks which box the vial should go in, one scans it into the excel spreadsheet, one physically moves vial from isopropanol container to box on dry ice; Transfer all vials at same time to ensure correct placement and ease for future shipment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare Cells for Transfection *all procedures in media with 5uM ROCK-I*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4mtto","text":"Cell are ready to be plated for transfection when they are 70-80% confluent. Use 3-5 wells from a 6w plate depending on confluency ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare Cells for Transfection *all procedures in media with 5uM ROCK-I*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"51bj0","text":"Coat 2-24w plates 1 day before experiment – incubate at 37C overnight","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7mbrc","text":"Plate two different densities and determine which to use on day of transfection based on confluency and cell survival","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare Cells for Transfection *all procedures in media with 5uM ROCK-I*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4smvt","text":"On day of experiment, cool plates \u003e1hr and set out appropriate amounts of media and accutase","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare Cells for Transfection *all procedures in media with 5uM ROCK-I*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"r8mu","text":"Aspirate coating matrix and add 0.5ml media to each well – return plates to incubator until ready to use","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare Cells for Transfection *all procedures in media with 5uM ROCK-I*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"br7sq","text":"Aspirate media and wash cells with DPBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare Cells for Transfection *all procedures in media with 5uM ROCK-I*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bg109","text":"Add 1ml/well accutase and incubate at 37C for 5 min; if cells are not easily detaching incubate 7-10 mins ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare Cells for Transfection *all procedures in media with 5uM ROCK-I*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6hgh5","text":"While incubating, add 2ml media to 15ml tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare Cells for Transfection *all procedures in media with 5uM ROCK-I*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5s9bg","text":"Following incubation, gently pipet cells twice and transfer to the prepared 15ml tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare Cells for Transfection *all procedures in media with 5uM ROCK-I*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ducq0","text":"Centrifuge 300g for 3 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare Cells for Transfection *all procedures in media with 5uM ROCK-I*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6d65f","text":"Aspirate supernatant – okay to leave a little film to not disturb pellet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare Cells for Transfection *all procedures in media with 5uM ROCK-I*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"98bb1","text":"Resuspend the pellet with a glass pipette in 4ml media – take 10µl for counting","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare Cells for Transfection *all procedures in media with 5uM ROCK-I*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4g64d","text":"Count cells using hemocytometer or countess machine","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare Cells for Transfection *all procedures in media with 5uM ROCK-I*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"43ah3","text":"Calculate 2e5 and 1.5e5 cells per well ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare Cells for Transfection *all procedures in media with 5uM ROCK-I*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2241i","text":"Resuspend then aliquot with glass pipette for 25 wells into a new 50ml tube; repeat for both densities ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare Cells for Transfection *all procedures in media with 5uM ROCK-I*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5aaj2","text":"Centrifuge 300g for 3 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare Cells for Transfection *all procedures in media with 5uM ROCK-I*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6nsav","text":"Remove plates from incubator and label for each condition ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare Cells for Transfection *all procedures in media with 5uM ROCK-I*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5ks3l","text":"Aspirate supernatant – okay to leave a little film to not disturb pellet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare Cells for Transfection *all procedures in media with 5uM ROCK-I*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5cqfs","text":" Resuspend cells in 12.5ml media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare Cells for Transfection *all procedures in media with 5uM ROCK-I*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"hham","text":" Add 0.5ml cell suspension for each well in 24w plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare Cells for Transfection *all procedures in media with 5uM ROCK-I*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"buej8","text":"After every 6 wells, move the plate in several quick, short, back-and-forth and side-to-side motions to evenly distribute the cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare Cells for Transfection *all procedures in media with 5uM ROCK-I*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c8uq3","text":"Incubate at 37C overnight","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare Cells for Transfection *all procedures in media with 5uM ROCK-I*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"295t9","text":"Repeat steps 17-21 for other density","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3nsh1","text":"Before transfection, decide which density has better cell survival and density","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f70ju","text":"Change media for selected plate with antibiotics free mTeSR Plus with 5µM ROCK-I (700ul per well)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6qn7m","text":"Prepare working plasmid solution using endo-free TE buffer in hood: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b5bol","text":"pEF-AncBE4max (from Brafman): 500ng/µl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e6amj","text":"pEF-BFP: 200ng/µl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dduq1","text":"pDT-sgRNA (with variant specific gRNA cloned): 300 ng/µl","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1u7s5","text":"Prepare tubes for each sgRNA, one for DNA master mix, and one for Lipo master mix (26 tubes)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4mesn","text":"Prepare DNA MM: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f5kvm","text":"625ul Opti-MEM","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ec1j6","text":"37.5ul AncBE4max","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5u79g","text":"37.5ul BFP","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5cka8","text":"Aliquot 28ul of DNA MM into each sgRNA tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eo3lf","text":"Add 1µl of each sgRNA to their corresponding tubes containing DNA MM","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9h5qd","text":"Prepare Lipo Master mix: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9vr1","text":"625ul Opti-MEM","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2dcmj","text":"82.5ul Lipofectamine STEM ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ep193","text":"Aliquot 28.3ul of LIPO MM to each sg RNA tube and mix well ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1u1hu","text":"Incubate at RT for 10 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ao3v9","text":"Towards end of incubation, label prepared 24w plate with corresponding gene numbers ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5c2qf","text":"Add 50µl complex dropwise into the correct well and gently swirl plate to ensure even distribution","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bi9is","text":"Return plate to incubator","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2a4cc","text":"24 hours post transfection, refresh media with regular mTeSR Plus","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4n61q","text":" 48 hours post transfection, refresh media with regular mTeSR Plus","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a0b4p","text":" 48 hours post transfection, coat 24 – 96w plates for sorting","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3aisi","text":"72 hours post transfection, prepare for FACS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare for FACS *all procedures use mTeSR plus with CEPT cocktail*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9nrd8","text":"Check 24w plate with confocal microscope before preparing for FACS – determine that there is enough GFP+ cells to sort","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare for FACS *all procedures use mTeSR plus with CEPT cocktail*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3qf9j","text":"Set out media and accutase to warm to RT – add CEPT components (1:10,000 chroman I, emricasan, and transISRIB; 1:1,000 polyamine supplement)  to media then filter before use","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare for FACS *all procedures use mTeSR plus with CEPT cocktail*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"de4vr","text":"Cool 96w plates \u003e1hr at RT then aspirate coating matrix and add 120µl media. Return plates to incubator for later use. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare for FACS *all procedures use mTeSR plus with CEPT cocktail*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"eoa7f","text":"Complete following procedure row by row (6 wells) for 4 batches of 6 wells. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare for FACS *all procedures use mTeSR plus with CEPT cocktail*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"57hp7","text":"Wash with DPBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare for FACS *all procedures use mTeSR plus with CEPT cocktail*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1fqrk","text":"Add 300µl accutase to each well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare for FACS *all procedures use mTeSR plus with CEPT cocktail*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c3nd0","text":"Incubate at 37C for 5 min; incubate longer 7-10 mins if needed ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare for FACS *all procedures use mTeSR plus with CEPT cocktail*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1e3h","text":"During incubation, label 15ml tubes for each condition and add 1 ml of media to each tube ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare for FACS *all procedures use mTeSR plus with CEPT cocktail*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e67uc","text":"Following incubation, gently pipet cells once and transfer to corresponding 15ml tubes ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare for FACS *all procedures use mTeSR plus with CEPT cocktail*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d0p1l","text":"Centrifuge 300g for 3 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare for FACS *all procedures use mTeSR plus with CEPT cocktail*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dsi21","text":"Aspirate supernatant – careful not to disturb pellet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare for FACS *all procedures use mTeSR plus with CEPT cocktail*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1pivq","text":" Resuspend pellet in 700µl media; 500ul if low cell confluence and 1ml if cell confluence is high","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare for FACS *all procedures use mTeSR plus with CEPT cocktail*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"36kqg","text":"Filter cell suspension twice using two different 5ml corning round bottom tubes with blue strainer cap","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare for FACS *all procedures use mTeSR plus with CEPT cocktail*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"491gv","text":"Replace the blue cap with a filterless white cap from a sample collection tube to avoid contamination","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare for FACS *all procedures use mTeSR plus with CEPT cocktail*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fs9el","text":"Put samples on ice immediately","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare for FACS *all procedures use mTeSR plus with CEPT cocktail*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3oru","text":"Sorting with FACS Aria – 1 double positive cell (BFP + GFP) into one well on 96w plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare for FACS *all procedures use mTeSR plus with CEPT cocktail*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1sqi","text":"After sorting, centrifuge the plates at 300g for 1 min to help cells attach","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare for FACS *all procedures use mTeSR plus with CEPT cocktail*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4fmn5","text":"Return plates to incubator ASAP","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Prepare for FACS *all procedures use mTeSR plus with CEPT cocktail*
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8k0or","text":"Repeat until all 4 batches are done","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Care after Sorting *All media changes with regular mTeSR Plus to dilute CEPT cocktail)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4bdnd","text":"24hr post sorting: do not disturb cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Care after Sorting *All media changes with regular mTeSR Plus to dilute CEPT cocktail)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3mbm5","text":"48hr post sorting: use robot pipettor to add 50µl media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Care after Sorting *All media changes with regular mTeSR Plus to dilute CEPT cocktail)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7qtj2","text":"72hr post sorting: use robot pipettor to change 50µl media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Care after Sorting *All media changes with regular mTeSR Plus to dilute CEPT cocktail)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"34taa","text":"96hr (Day 4) post sorting: use robot pipettor to change 120µl media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Care after Sorting *All media changes with regular mTeSR Plus to dilute CEPT cocktail)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f0mop","text":"144hr (Day 6) post sorting: aspirate 120µl, add 100µl media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Care after Sorting *All media changes with regular mTeSR Plus to dilute CEPT cocktail)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ejp8t","text":"Afterwards, use robot pipettor to change 100µl media every other day","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Care after Sorting *All media changes with regular mTeSR Plus to dilute CEPT cocktail)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6rmpn","text":"It takes 10-14 days for a single cell to grow into a colony with appropriate size for picking  Approximately one week post sorting, determine which wells have colonies and start to mark/plan for colony picking","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"an37q","text":"Day before experiment: Determine which plates you will be picking from based on size and colony morphology – mark 12 best colonies with microscope; Each colony marked plate will go onto one row on two identical 96w plates (see example below) – one plate for maintaining cells and one plate for DNA extraction","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cfb3t","text":"Day before experiment: Coat one row on 96w plate for each plate that is ready to be picked- normally 2-3 plates for the first round of picking depending on growth rate, then another 2 plates for the second round","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5toug","text":"Ex. 8 marked plates = one full 96 well plate ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7rped","text":"On day of the experiment, cool plates \u003e1hr RT then aspirate coating matrix and add 80µl mTeSR Plus with 5µM ROCK-I to each well (maintenance plates); an uncoated empty 96w plate copy is needed for each coated plate for DNA extraction (DNA plates). Label plates to correspond to the correct genes and indicate whether they are the \"DNA plate\" or the \"maintenance plate\" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1u1h6","text":"Pick colonies from one marked plate at a time following the below procedures ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5tgcr","text":"Aspirate 50-70µl media from marked wells so around 70-100µl left","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9oc7r","text":"Set p200 pipettor at 50µl and scrape in marked area of well ~30 seconds then collect as many aggregates as possible in 50µl volume","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cb314","text":"Transfer the 50µl aggregates into a well on the maintenance plate, mix well by pipetting 3 times ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eb1gd","text":"Withdraw 50ul cell suspension from maintenance plate and add to DNA plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6032j","text":"Repeat well by well until row is completed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"35bul","text":"Repeat process until maintenance and DNA plates have all intended genes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bdd6i","text":"Centrifuge maintenance and DNA plates at 300g for 3 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6jk0g","text":"Return maintenance plate to incubator","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2vpsf","text":"Quickly aspirate media without disturbing the cells from the DNA plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"27vh8","text":"Plate can be stored at -20C temporarily, no more than an hour – while picking other maintenance and DNA plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4e6sc","text":"Add 16µl DNA quick extract to well on DNA plate and gently scrape/flush the well bottom to collect all cell aggregates – one well at a time, on ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2769v","text":"Transfer 16µl solution into a 96w PCR plate – keeping the same format as the DNA plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e5tac","text":"Briefly spin PCR plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"40gmn","text":"Run DNA extraction protocol on thermos cycler (1st step in Sanger sequencing workflow)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7aejs","text":"Follow Sanger sequencing protocol to get results in 2-3 days","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c6au8","text":"DNA Extraction -\u003e Amplification PCR -\u003e SAP -\u003e Sequence PCR -\u003e Purification -\u003e Sequencing ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eo7vt","text":"Run DNA extraction protocol on thermocycler: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bi071","text":"a. 65C for 15 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7v205","text":"b. 68C for 15 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5os6","text":"c. 95C for 10 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cur92","text":"d. 4C for ever ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c2jrv","text":"Go directly to PCR Amp step, do not pause here! ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dc5hs","text":"Prepare working primer from stock solution (100uM to 10uM) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9hpgd","text":"Prepare master mix for each gene and for appropriate number of wells, accounting for 20% extra: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6pud","text":"AmpPCR mix 1x (ul) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cl5ui","text":"Water 5.5","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"er5ng","text":"10X PCR Amplification Buffer 1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"674j6","text":"10X PCR Enhancer 1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aronv","text":"50mM MgSO4 0.3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ghnl","text":"10mM dNTP 0.2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5o3kq","text":"Primer F 0.2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5t6de","text":"Primer R 0.2 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dtt1","text":"Polymerase 0.1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cl616","text":"Transfer prepared AmpPCR mixes into corresponding rows on a 96w PCR plate (8.5ul per well)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6tis1","text":"Add 1.5ul quick extracted DNA to plates and mix 3 times ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3vmeq","text":"Seal plates and briefly centrifuge 2000g ~5 seconds","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"duss4","text":"Run PCR Amp protocol on thermocycler: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ls77","text":"a. 95C for 10 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5kvoa","text":"b. 95C for 30 sec","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dvboh","text":"c. 53C for 1 min 30 sec","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9evtq","text":"d. 72C for 1 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3qf7v","text":"e. Step b-d 40 times","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d6lr3","text":"f. 72C for 10 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bee9n","text":"g. 4C for ever","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6039h","text":"Directly to SAP step or can pause here; leave plate at 4C \u003c18 hrs ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e7p0l","text":"Prepare master mix: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bc1g6","text":"SAP mix 1x(ul)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"evbk3","text":"Water 3.9","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eenec","text":"10x SAP buffer 0.5","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e3j95","text":"SAP 0.5","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b1n06","text":"E. coli exonuclease I 0.1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"avade","text":"Pipette 5ul SAP mix into each well on a 96w plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2mgbk","text":"Add 5ul PCR product to each well on SAP plate, pipetting 3 times to mix ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9sd1r","text":"Briefly centrifuge 2000g ~5 sec","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dq1o3","text":"Run SAP protocol on thermocycler: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6i8ee","text":"a. 37C for 50 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2b0p3","text":"b. 95C for 15 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2cjqa","text":"c. 4C for ever ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7bb9p","text":"May pause here, leave the plate at 4C \u003c18hr, or go directly to Seq PCR step ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"619bu","text":"Prepare master mix following table above for each gene - only use either F primer or R primer, do not use both! Be aware of primer records, some genes require more of less big dye ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"60s5j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aresb","text":"Seq PCR mix 1x (ul)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eh9m5","text":"Water 2 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fovo5","text":"Big dye 2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bq5cn","text":"Primer F or R","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"25i8e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"51qpu","text":"Pipette 5ul mix into a 96w PCR plate, being careful to be consistent with gene placement","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"av86h","text":"Add 5ul SAP product, pipetting 3 times to mix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5tirc","text":"Seal the plate and briefly centrifuge 2000g ~5 sec","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ea3gu","text":"Run Seq PCR protocol on thermocycler: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aj4bk","text":"a. 96C for 1m in","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a4q13","text":"b. 96C for 10 sec","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dueh2","text":"c. 55C for 5 sec","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d5sgr","text":"d. 60C for 4 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9abhg","text":"e. Step b-d for 25 times","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d9i8s","text":"f. 4C for ever ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"73t1o","text":"May pause here, leave the plate at 4C \u003c18 hrs or go directly to purification step ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b2316","text":"Prepare fresh 75% isopropanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"76of6","text":"Add 40µl 75% isopropanol into each well, pipetting 3 times to mix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"acj50","text":"Gently attach a sealing film and incubate at RT for 20 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b4a28","text":"Centrifuge plate at 2700g for 30 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bibbd","text":"Gently invert the plate onto paper towel","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"455at","text":"Add 150µl 75% isopropanol in each well, do not mix! ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dt60m","text":"Reseal the plate and centrifuge at 2700g for 12 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"30t9g","text":"Gently invert the plate onto a paper towel","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3r1ek","text":"Keep the plate inverted and transfer to a new paper towel and centrifuge at 200g for 1 min to remove residual isopropanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4d6j1","text":"11.   Directly go to next step","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"42afb","text":"Add 16µl HiDi formamide to each well, pipetting 3 times to mix ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9tani","text":"Seal the plate and centrifuge at 2000g for ~5 sec","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f5764","text":"Run the forma protocol on thermocycler: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qmif","text":"a. 95C for 3 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2pqbm","text":"b. 4C for 2 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ai0jp","text":"c. 4C for ever ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d8rk","text":"Centrifuge at 2000g for 1 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e8kgh","text":"Ready to load","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"athhq","text":"Start 3730 software ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"27o3a","text":"Select instrument status","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8815j","text":"Connect the polymer bottle – set waste bottle and cap on white tray","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f0h83","text":"Run bubble remove wizard twice (check for bubbles) then fill array","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"coloo","text":"In plate manager – import or build a new template for today’s run ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"288eg","text":"Go to run scheduler – search the plate ID and add plate in the queue","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1srch","text":"Make sure to remove any sealing film on PCR plate (will damage array if not)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6jd1e","text":"Put the PCR plate in the black bottom, add a clean grey septa on it, then attach the white top – make sure it clicks closed and have angled corner of black bottom on top right of PCR plate, A12 on PCR plate goes in angled corner to have correct orientation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2u3h7","text":"10.   Put the PCR plate sandwich into the “In stack” drawer – make sure to close the door properly","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3pctq","text":"11.   When the system detects plates in the “In stack”, click “play” button – top left in the software – then click “yes” to confirm and start the program","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cvv2l","text":"12.   Takes ~2 hours to run a full 96w plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2ln4h","text":"13.   After run, copy data to a flashdrive ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ktn8","text":"14.   Exit the software, shutdown the computer, and return the polymer to 4C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"k7ke","text":"Analyze data on computer with SeqScape ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cdtd7","text":"18.   Check each sample for expected editing and record – use to decide which wells to expand","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"731ph","text":"After viewing Sanger sequencing results, label 4 wells to keep on 96w plate – two to expand and two as backups; prioritize homozygous clones and clones with the best morphology ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"diost","text":"24hr post picking, add 50µl regular mTeSR Plus into selected wells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4h4ul","text":"48hr post picking, change 80µl media for selected wells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"60q09","text":"Change 100µl media every other day","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dm72n","text":"Once colonies have grown to proper size (typically 4-6 days), expand from 96w to 6w","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8qpj1","text":"Coat one well on 6w plate for each well on 96w plate that is ready to be expanded – incubate \u003e4hr","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c29p0","text":"Cool 6w plates \u003e1hr at RT and label for each well being expanded – cell line, gene #, clone, gene name, passage #","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5hjoh","text":"Aspirate coating matrix and add 2ml media to each well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"hgqr","text":"Then aspirate media from wells ready to be expanded with p200","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1c51c","text":"Add 100µl ReLeSR to wells and immediately aspirate – add and aspirate from wells one by one","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"14uql","text":"Incubate for 3 min at RT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"82k6e","text":" Add 100µl media to each well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1d1pm","text":" Scrape colonies one by one using p200 – scape entire area","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e4ro8","text":"Aspirate full volume from well and add to corresponding well on the 6w plate – move back and forth, right and left to gently disperse cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5mb2o","text":"Passage cells once to have 2 wells on 6w plates with appropriate confluence for each clone – one well is needed for cryopreservation and one well for RNA isolation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fiusk","text":"Add 800ul buffer RLT Plus to expanded 6w plates with 70-80% confluence","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7kl8h","text":"Pipet 30-60 seconds, washing the well until the solution is homogenized and clear","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"52if4","text":"Add 350ul each to two locking lid 1.5 ml microcentrifuge tubes ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3jgqd","text":"Store in -80C for temporary storage. Within a week, isolate RNA using the RNeasy Plus Mini Kit ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4290k","text":"Transfer cell lysate to QIA shredder and centrifuge 2 min at max speed ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a75fl","text":"Transfer liquid to gDNA elimination column and centrifuge 15 sec at 11,000 rpm","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"epqma","text":"Discard flow through and keep spin column and tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cba8s","text":"Add 350ul 70% ethanol to lysate and mix until homogenized ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"89arn","text":"Transfer to RNA easy spin column and centrifuge 15 sec at 11,000 rpm","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d4n0t","text":"Discard flow through and keep spin column and tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"56o1t","text":"Add 700ul buffer RW1 to RNA easy spin column and centrifuge for 1 min at full speed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8cqa0","text":"Discard flow through and keep spin column and tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"agkl2","text":"Add 500ul buffer RPE to RNA easy spin column and centrifuge 15 sec at 11,000 rpm","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"665bf","text":"Discard flow through and keep spin column and tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7it84","text":"Repeat previous step, centrifuge for 2 min rather than 15 sec","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5nvsq","text":"Transfer RNA easy spin column to collection tube and centrifuge 1 min at full speed","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"h880","text":"Transfer RNA easy spin column in labeled 1.5l tube and add 35ul RNAse free water directly to the membrane ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"51gq","text":"Centrifuge for 1 min at 11,000 rpm","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f460v","text":"Discard RNA easy spin column and place 1.5ml tube directly on ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3lc0h","text":"Measure the concentrations of each sample using the NanoDrop","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"faick","text":"Aliquot 20-25ul into new labeled 1.5ml tubes and wrap well with parafilm to ship to Novogene","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
